history.proof: intros P p H. induction H. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: in_eq. - destruct IHinPolySet as [q [Hq1 Hq2]]. exists q. split. + apply in_cons. apply Hq1. + apply Hq2.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) The term "a" has type "(A * mon n)%type" while it is expected to have type "poly A0 eqA ltM".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : Term A n p : list (Term A n) H : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Unable to unify "?M2245 = ?M2245 \\/ (fix In (a : ?M2244) (l : list ?M2244) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | nil => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) ?M2245 ?M2246" with "exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, In q (exist (fun l0 : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM l0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) H :: P) /\\ pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p = s2p q".

original: intros P p H. induction H. - exists a. split. + apply in_eq. + reflexivity. - destruct IHinPolySet as [q [Hq1 Hq2]]. exists q. split. + apply in_cons. apply Hq1. + apply Hq2.
